client_description_Summary_Note:
The RM met Larsen Andersen Østergaard during a business conference in Copenhagen. They attended several sessions together and realized they shared similar professional goals, leading to a fruitful partnership.
Larsen Andersen Østergaard is a 28 year old and comes from Denmark.
He was impressed by Julius Baer's global presence and expertise in private banking, leading to the decision to join.
client_description_Family_Background: Larsen Andersen Østergaard is married to Mathilde. They do not have any children.
client_description_Education_Background:
Larsen obtained his secondary school diploma from Faaborg Gymnasium in 2015.
Larsen pursued higher education at University of Copenhagen, graduating in 2019.
client_description_Occupation_History:
Larsen Andersen Østergaard is a 28 year old and comes from Denmark.
Larsen Andersen Østergaard launched his career as a Junior Trader at Norden A/S, where he gained valuable experience from 2021 till now.
client_description_Wealth_Summary:
He managed to save approximately 190000 DKK from his earnings at all companies.
Client does not have any properties.In 2020, he received an inheritance of 12400000 DKK from his late grandmother, who was a prominent Neurosurgeon, and has since invested it in various assets.
client_description_Client_Summary: Given the client's impressive career history and financial discipline, we are confident in his ability to achieve financial success and security.
